title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: Hey guys  i have some problems  with my launcher. I tried the "launcher.admin" but this didn't work, i have also tried to reinstall LoL but it's the same way so if you guys, have some solutions please tell me thank you guys ;){{champion:238}} {{champion:157}}

replies.body:
Okay so i have managed to fix mine :s though the fact it worked has me kinda confused :s lol

I decided to update my windows, since they were downloaded already and i had nothing better to do. After the updates were done and my windows had loaded back up again i figured i would try one more time before giving up. miraculously it worked. LoL client is working now :) hopefully this helps you LordofCelestian :D if not gl if i find a fix will post it for you :D
Thank you Iriana, you right it working now :D

My housemate is having an issue to, keeps saying firewall issue and it isn't. unlike previously when this was a problem and it was happening during game loading screen this is happening when we have tried to load league. launcher wont start up just straight away tells us there is a firewall issue. Occurred almost immediately after the last game we played together and we can't get it working. 

Any help would be appreciated.

*EDIT*

so is happening with  my league now to :s a response on this would be great riot :s its a little annoying lol
